name: Igloo Invaders
description:
NOTE: when playing the game in browser, please play on full screen

There currently is no way to exit the game. Please use ALT+F4 or the mac equivalent. 

My submission for the UofT GDDC club deathmatch game jam with the theme "Homebound".

WARNING

The game is VERY early in development and barely playable at the moment.

The game is not very user friendly and not very balanced

The some of the current features such as enemy spawning and ability acquisition (not the upgrades) are not implemented as intended. The current version is made to make the game minimally playable.

Gameplay Instructions:

WASD to move

left click to attack

alpha number keys (not the numpad) 1,2,3,4 for abilities (unlocks after level10, at 5 level intervals, only 2 are currently implemented)
